description:
Create a new genbank file with a subset of contigs from the input

From a domainator-annotated genbank file, extracts a subset of contigs based on selection criteria.

Selection criteria are combined as follows:

(contig length within specified bounds [length_lb, length_ub])
AND 
(contig matches specified taxonomy filters)
AND # INVERT applies to this list of criteria
(
   (contig name in specified list [contigs, contigs_file])
OR (contig name matches specified regex [contigs_regex])
OR (contig definition matches specified regex [definition_regex]) 
OR (contig sequence matches specified regex [sequence_regex])
OR (contig contains at least one domain with name in specified list [target_domains, target_domains_file]) 
OR (contig contains a combination of domains that match the specified boolean expression [domain_expr])
OR (contig contains no domains [unannotated])
)
AND
(total number of selected contigs is less than or equal to specified maximum [first])

If --invert is specified, the selection criteria in the middle expression (the stuff linked by OR) are inverted. That is, length and first are still applied, 
but the contigs that would have been selected by the middle expression are instead discarded, and contigs that would have been discarded are selected.

parameters.name: Input
parameters.help: names of input genbank files. If not supplied, reads from stdin.

parameters.name: Output
parameters.help: genbank output file name. If not supplied writes to stdout.

parameters.name: Contigs
parameters.help: Only consider contigs with these names.

parameters.name: Contigs File
parameters.help: text file containing names of contigs to select.

parameters.name: Contigs Regex
parameters.help: Only consider contigs with names matching this regex.

parameters.name: Definition Regex
parameters.help: only keep contigs with a definition that matches this regex.

parameters.name: Sequence Regex
parameters.help: only keep contigs with a sequence that matches this regex.

parameters.name: Domains
parameters.help: Include domains with these names

parameters.name: Domains File
parameters.help: text file containing names of domains to include.

parameters.name: Domain Expr
parameters.help: a boolean expression using operators & (AND), | (OR), and ~(NOT), to specify a desired combination of domains

parameters.name: Domain Type
parameters.help: The type of domain to consider, domain, search, both. Default: domain

parameters.name: Databases
parameters.help: Consider only domains from these databases when filtering by domain. default: all databases.

parameters.name: Unannotated
parameters.help: Select contigs with no domain annotations.

parameters.name: Evalue
parameters.help: the evalue cutoff for domain annotations to be considered when selecting by domain.

parameters.name: Fasta Out
parameters.help: makes output a fasta file when activated

parameters.name: Include Taxids
parameters.help: Space separated list of taxids to include

parameters.name: Exclude Taxids
parameters.help: Space separated list of taxids to exclude

parameters.name: Ncbi Taxonomy Path
parameters.help: Path to NCBI taxonomy database directory. Will be created and downloaded if it does not exist.

parameters.name: Taxonomy Update
parameters.help: If taxonomy database exists, check it against the version on the ncbi server and update if there is a newer version.

parameters.name: First
parameters.help: If set then stop after returning this many contigs.

parameters.name: Length Lb
parameters.help: skip contigs smaller than this. In units of bp (aa for protein input).

parameters.name: Length Ub
parameters.help: skip contigs larger than this. In units of bp (aa for protein input).

parameters.name: Search Score Lb
parameters.help: Skip contigs with a domain_search annotation score smaller than this.

parameters.name: Search Score Ub
parameters.help: Skip contigs with a domain_search annotation score larger than this.

parameters.name: Invert
parameters.help: Invert the selection criteria. i.e. return contigs that do not match the selection criteria.
